title: Pole Star
description: It’s hard to flirt when sequins are chafing your bits…Injured pole dancer Matt Lovell meets attractive radiographer Sal when he’s in casualty for an x-ray. Trouble is, Matt’s firefighter outfit is pretty convincing, and the longer he keeps up the pretence the harder it will be to reveal the naked that there’s nothing underneath his costume but a sequinned thong!
author: Josephine Myles
